Ecommerce Website

Client: Yoobee Web Bootcamp.
Date: February 2015.
Visit Website

Project Description

This ecommerce project was built using a Shopify CMS basic template and I really enjoyed it from a development point of view.

I find the Liquid template language really convenient for creating templates not only with shopify but with other applications like jekyll. This website itself has been created using Jekyll and Liquid.

I also worked with Sass as it is now part of Shopify.
